title: Four Fanged Offense
opening: Lloyd: ...Can it really be them? I thought they were in Nabata!
Linus: What does it matter where they've been? We found them, so let's take care of them.
Lloyd: I guess you're right... Linus, go tell father what's happening.
Linus: Why?! They're right in front of us! You and I could finish this now.

Lloyd: Moron. It's a precaution. The Fangs cannot afford mistakes. Don't worry I have underlings aplenty. I'll taunt the foe and draw them to the fortress in the north. I doubt I'll lose, but... They've survived this long, so they must be tough. I might run into trouble. Deliver your report, then get back here with reinforcements.
Linus: You can't be serious. They don't look like they can last long against you, the White Wolf.
Linus: ...Understood. I'll be back soon, though, so leave some for me!
Black Fang: That's right. You have the honor of dying at the hands of the Four Fangs. Our commander is Lloyd, the White Wolf.
Hector: Eliwood! Is that the enemy?
Black Fang: ...Come. You'll get your throats ripped out...

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: We're in Bern now. I wonder what's happened? The village seems so busy.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: I spoke to some villagers on the way here. They said Prince Zephiel's coming-of-age ceremony is in ten days. There's no helping all the excitement.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: They've no idea what's happening. Carefree fools.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: ......Tell me, Hawkeye, do you know the location of the Shrine of Seals?

intro.speaker: Hawkeye
intro.line: I've heard it's north of Bern. But the location of the shrine itself is secret. I doubt if anyone outside the royal family knows how to reach it.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: So, if we want to reach the shrine, we'll have to contact the royal family, is that it?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Without revealing our identities or our motives? There's got to be another way to find where it is.

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: ...I can provide you with its general location.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Lord Pent?

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: I'm privy to the highest secrets of military information in Etruria. When we learned of the shrine's existence, we investigated. However, none of our operatives returned. Bern's defenses are formidable.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: So, even if we reach the shrine, we're as like as not to be captured?

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: Most likely. And if your identities are discovered, Bern will see it as an excuse to invade Lycia.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: That, above all else, must be avoided.

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: That's where I come in.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: What do you mean?

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: Duty demands that I attend the post-ceremony festivities. However, I will greet the queen privately before the ceremony.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Privately? You can do that?

intro.speaker: Louise
intro.line: Queen Hellene was born in Etruria. She and I are related, albeit a distant relation.

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: When we meet, I will discreetly ask about the Shrine of Seals. Most like, she'll not say much, but anything will help, will it not? Rest assured, even if I fail, I will not reveal your presence.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Lord Pent! That's--

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: If we do not return by tomorrow, return to Lycia and come up with a new plan. Understood?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: ...If you fail, what will become of you?

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: Everything will work out. It wouldn't be a bad life. Abandoning my position... Living on the run with Louise...

intro.speaker: Louise
intro.line: If I'm with you, my Lord Pent, I care not where we go.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: I pray for your success.

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: Please do! Let us proceed, Louise.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Come back safely! We'll be waiting for you!!

intro.speaker: Hawkeye
intro.line: ...Pent, hold on.

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: What is it, Hawkeye?

intro.speaker: Hawkeye
intro.line: I was holding this for the master.

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: It's a... Heaven seal!

intro.speaker: Hawkeye
intro.line: Mm...There are only three in existence.

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: What is Archsage Athos's plan?

intro.speaker: Hawkeye
intro.line: I'm to give it to them when the time is right.

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: ...I see.

intro.speaker: Hawkeye
intro.line: I... I might not know the right time when it comes. I want you to take care of it.

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: Thank you, but what if we do not return?

intro.speaker: Hawkeye
intro.line: You will. You and Louise... .......without fail.

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: ...I understand.

intro.speaker: Louise
intro.line: Lord Hawkeye, we... we will most certainly return.

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: Well, if it isn't Nino.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Yeah! Lloyd! Linus! What is it? Are you working?

intro.speaker: Lloyd
intro.line: I suppose we are.

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: How about you? Where are you off to in such a hurry?

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: I have a job to do, too! I'm carrying messages for Mother, so I have to do my best! See you! Let's do something when your job is finished.

intro.speaker: Lloyd
intro.line: She's a good lass.

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: Yes. Hard to believe she's that woman's child.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: This waiting is hard. There must be something we can do.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: I know what you mean, but we have to lay low...

intro.speaker: Legault
intro.line: Why don't we try and gather some information on the Black Fang?

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Hm? Information?

intro.speaker: Legault
intro.line: Yes. Black Fang's headquarters are here in Bern. The location was never disclosed to me, though. The Black Fang is so much different than it once was. Any information we could gain would be beneficial.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: That's a good idea. Thanks, Legault.

intro.speaker: Legault
intro.line: Think nothing of it.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: What do you think, Tactician? ...You're right. Any information we find would be a starting place. Then it's settled. Let's get started.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Let's split up and go. Try to blend in.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: We'd better be careful.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Especially you, Hector.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: What!?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Those two... I can't tell if they're friends or not.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Tee hee...

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Is something funny, Ninian?

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: It's just... Listen to you grumble, Lord Eliwood! You sound like you're their chaperon!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Really? Is that what it sounds like to you?

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Uh-huh.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: That's great...

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Ha ha ha.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: ...I like it when you laugh.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Excuse me?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Oh, nothing. Come on! Let's go!

intro.speaker: Lloyd
intro.line: ...Can it really be them? I thought they were in Nabata!

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: What does it matter where they've been? We found them, so let's take care of them.

intro.speaker: Lloyd
intro.line: I guess you're right... Yet the timing's not right. Attacking them while they're in town is against our creed. ...Shall we tell Father and await his orders?

intro.speaker: Lloyd
intro.line: Linus, I'll go and tell Father. You stay here and watch them.

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: Why don't you and I finish them now?

intro.speaker: Lloyd
intro.line: We can't! You have to be patient. All you need to do is watch where they go. Understand?

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: Uh-huh.

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: ......Even so, I can't ignore game when it's nibbling on my line. Hey! Igor!

intro.speaker: Igor
intro.line: What is it, Linus?

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: We're going hunting! We'll taunt them and pull them to the center of the town.

intro.speaker: Igor
intro.line: Hold on a minute. You're not really going to ignore Lloyd's orders, are you?

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: ...He doesn't want the villagers harmed. That's what he said, right? So we make sure they're not.

intro.speaker: Igor
intro.line: I understand, but...

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: Come on, Igor! We want to show my brother we can do this, right? I'm counting on you!

intro.speaker: Igor
intro.line: ...Grrr! You just never, ever listen to anyone!

intro.speaker: Igor
intro.line: You are Eliwood?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Who--Ah, you're Black Fang?

intro.speaker: Igor
intro.line: That's right. You have the honor of dying at the hands of the Four Fangs. Our commander is Linus, the Mad Dog.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Eliwood! Is that the enemy?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Yes. Let's meet his challenge!

intro.speaker: Igor
intro.line: ...Come. You'll get your throats ripped out...

battle.speaker: Wallace
battle.line: Grrrr!! Not again! This is the 75th time! I could have SWORN Caelin was in this direction! Grrr... Eh? Something's wrong... Is it a sneak attack!? You cowards, waiting in the fog!! My name is Wallace! The boldest knight in all Caelin (wherever it is)! If you're not afraid to die, show yourselves!!! Bwah ha ha ha ha ha ha!!!

visit.speaker: Nino
visit.line: Er... Is there something I can help you with? I have an injured man here. Please keep your voice down! No, I don't know anything about the Black Fang! Leave, please! You'll upset my patient!

visit.speaker: Woman
visit.line: Tell me, traveler, have you heard of the Four Fangs? The folk of Bern know all about them. They're the four strongest members of the righteous Black Fang. The one they call the Mad Dog is a great man. When I was being attacked by bandits, he rescued me. It was night, so I really couldn't see his face, but... I've heard some troubling rumors about the Black Fang lately, though. I wonder what's going on.

visit.speaker: Old Woman
visit.line: Long ago...the lord who ruled this area was an awful man. Every night he would hold an extravagant feast below the castle. Meanwhile, we villagers slowly starved to death. One day, though, it ended. The lord was dead. The Black Fang had given him a death sentence. To us, the Black Fang were heroes. It matters not what others said. That's what makes it so hard... Why did they have to change? Helping you...means that I'm betraying the Black Fang. And yet...I want you to have this.
No need for alarm. For reasons of my own, I wear the garb of the Black Fang, but I'm a loyal citizen of Lycia, and I am not your enemy.
A woman now leads the Black Fang around by the nose. When at last you confront her, use this staff. This woman is the ringleader you seek. Her name is Sonia. Do not forget. Sonia.

visit.speaker: Old Man
visit.line: Long ago, I used to work in Bern's royal palace. I was Prince Zephiel's teacher of history. The prince is a wise lad. He's the royal family's first prodigy. Yet King Desmond ignores the boy's talents, and they wither. Here...I'd like you to take this. This is an Earth seal. This one item contains the powers of many: Knight crest, Guide ring, Hero crest, Elysian whip... I am unsure why I would entrust this treasure to a complete stranger. I cannot explain it, but I have a feeling. For some reason, I believe you will aid the prince... Strange... Go on! Humor an old man and take it.

visit.speaker: Soldier
visit.line: I will repeat it as often as necessary, Lord Murdock! If we let the king's tyranny continue, Bern will--

recruit-talk.speaker: Dart
recruit-talk.line: Wait a minute. I've seen you before.

recruit-talk.speaker: Geitz
recruit-talk.line: What? Do you think you can just come up and start--

recruit-talk.speaker: Dart
recruit-talk.line: Ah, I know! You're that guy who worked for Belger...Geitz!

recruit-talk.speaker: Geitz
recruit-talk.line: Dart!? Is that you? What are you doing here?

recruit-talk.speaker: Dart
recruit-talk.line: I like to raise some trouble on land every now and then. How about you? What are you doing? Working for your father?

recruit-talk.speaker: Geitz
recruit-talk.line: Don't mention the old man!! As far as I'm concerned, I'm no part of that family anymore!

recruit-talk.speaker: Dart
recruit-talk.line: Well then, what are you doing here?

recruit-talk.speaker: Geitz
recruit-talk.line: Nothing... I was wandering about when this battle erupted. ...Say, Dart, do you think I could join up with you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Geitz
recruit-talk.line: You're "raising trouble," right? So, let me in on the action.

recruit-talk.speaker: Dart
recruit-talk.line: It's fine with me. We're up against a pretty touch bunch, though.

recruit-talk.speaker: Geitz
recruit-talk.line: I've nothing else to do. I'll fight 'til I get bored!

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: In the name of the Fang, I sentence you to death. Do not blame me for your fate. It is your own doing.

boss.speaker: Eliwood
boss.line: ...Are you the leader of this group?

boss.speaker: Eliwood
boss.line: I heard that the Black Fang possessed strong convictions. If so, then why do you follow a man like Nergal?

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: This has nothing to do with Nergal or Sonia. We simply complete the missions given us.

boss.speaker: Eliwood
boss.line: And you never question the justness of your missions?

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: Who are we to pass judgment on the commands given us? We are the jaw that bites. We act without question.

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: Granted, you don't seem like a bad sort. However, the Fang's judgment cannot be undone. It is time for you to die.

boss.speaker: Hector
boss.line: ...And you would be the leader of this pack of curs?

boss.speaker: Hector
boss.line: I've no mercy for Nergal's hounds of the hunt! Stand and prepare to be beaten.

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: You... You wish to challenge me with that axe of yours? ...You're amusing, I'll grant you that. I'm sure you'd have Linus laughing if he were here. Be warned, you would do well not to take me lightly.

end.speaker: Lloyd
end.line: ......I'm beaten. You are strong. Stronger than I'd realized

end.speaker: Lloyd
end.line: You're foolish as well. To waste sentiment on me, your enemy...

end.speaker: Lloyd
end.line: Peace. I've no plans on fleeing with a hostage. After I deal with you, I'll let the rest of them go.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: We battled your comrade Uhai on the Dread Isle... He told us he'd do nothing so cowardly as take a hostage. He fought with honor. You Black Fang are not evil by nature. So why is it that we fight?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Yes. With. his dying breath, he told us the way to the Dragon's Gate.

end.speaker: Lloyd
end.line: Go. Don't worry. I too, have my honor. I will not attack again.

end.speaker: Lloyd
end.line: No... However, something is amiss. You have been granted a brief reprieve until I have my answers.

end.speaker: Lloyd
end.line: I'll tell you next time we meet. Be seeing you. Watch out for the woman named Sonia.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Forgive me. I wanted to speak with him at least once.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Don't worry. It's fine. After all, we learned a little something about our opponent.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: The Black Fang seems to have some honor after all. Perhaps they really are just being used by Nergal. We should talk to their leader, Brendan Reed.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Perhaps we can resolve this without any more fighting.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: I don't like it sounds like a terrible plan.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Let's get back to camp. We might have some word from Pent and the others.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: I wonder what that was all about.

end.speaker: Lloyd
end.line: ...As I suspected. They are not the gang of thugs Sonia made them out to be....How do I unmask that woman for what she truly is? Ah!!

end.speaker: Limstella
end.line: Lloyd, the White Wolf. Such strong quintessence.

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Uh-huh. We've met many times. I don't think I told you my name, though. I'm Nino! Sonia's daughter.

end.speaker: Jaffar
end.line: Have you forgotten the law of the Fang? "Sacrifice the wounded to salvage the strong."

end.speaker: Jaffar
end.line: I was unconscious and alone outside of our safe halls. You should have obeyed the law... Killed me, and then fled. Yet you didn't. Why?

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Bu-But... Letting a comrade die? I...couldn't do that.

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Don't move! Here! Lean on me!

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Please, don't move. So much blood... You're bleeding again. What do I do? It won't stop.

end.speaker: Linus
end.line: Lloyd... Brother? Lloyd!! This...is unforgivable! I will kill them all!! Not a one will survive!!!
